scripts.clean.build: for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; yarn clean.build; cd ../..; done
scripts.clean.dependencies: rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json yarn.lock && for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; yarn clean.dependencies; cd ../..; done
scripts.upgrade.packages: yarn add -D eslint lerna @sprucelabs/resolve-path-aliases @sprucelabs/semantic-release -W ; for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; spruce upgrade || true; cd ../..; done
scripts.update.dependencies: yarn clean.dependencies && yarn; yarn add -D lerna -W ; for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; spruce update.dependencies; cd ../..; done
